abstract:
Each of these projects has an amazing resident service and was built
entirely using free and open source tools

1) Predicting Displacement using Scikit Learn and Pandas 2) Counting
   Bicyclists and Pedestrians with Machine Vision 3) Scaling City Data
   Systems with Airflow.

We will also talk about government contracting and how to get a job with
the City of LA.
description:
This is a short technical deep dive into a few different projects where
the City of Los Angeles is using Python to help residents.

1) Predicting Displacement using Scikit Learn and Pandas 2) Counting
   Bicyclists and Pedestrians with Machine Vision 3) Scaling City Data
   Systems with Airflow.

Each of these projects details how the City of LA is powered with
Python.
title: Python at City Scale
